11211.content: My name is *insert name here*, and I'm new in town. I just got attended to my new school and I got a bad feeling about the next few days. I was waiting in the main foyer for my tour guide and minding my own business until three girls came through the door. "Hello, I'm *insert name here*. Are you three new as well?" Then the one with big curly hair said "we are. My name is Adagio Dazzle, and these are my friends Aria Blaze, and Sanota Dusk." As soon as they told me there names I had a strange feeling that I meet them before. Then a girl with a sun on her shirt came up to us and said "Hi, are you the students I'm supost to show around?" Then I said "Yes that is us. My name is *insert name here* and this is Adagio Dazzle, Sanota Dusk, and Aria Blaze. what is your name?" When I asked her while I shook here hand she said "I'm Sunset Shimmer, and by the way CHS is a great school. I believe you'll make great friends here." As we were walking down the hall Adagio said "Oh, I believe we will. We did since something magical about this school." The tour went on for full two minutes as we were headed for the lunch room. Sunset Shimmer was very kind to show us the whole school, now I needed a map for this place. "Theres the sciene lab, band class is over there." I was amazed on how well every one of the students in this school were good friend then Shimmer told us "Oh we're having a musical show case the week. Since your all new here, mabey you can sign up for it." I was intersted about that, then I asked "Are you in a band, and can I join it?" Sunset Shimmer anwered with a double yes then I took notice on the necklaces that Adagio and her friends were wearing. "Hey, those necklaces they look good on you were did you.." As soon as reached over too touch the ruby necklace, Adagio grabbed my arm and then...
11211.title: *insert name here*

choices: I pulled an amulet out of my pocket and put it on
112111.content: An entirely new location flashed before my eyes, I was a creature with a fish tail and horse body with fins. I was (favorite color), I saw three other creatures similar, only orange, purple, and blue. They, along with me, were being tossed and turned through a vortex. Suddenly, all the memories came flooding back... I was I siren, and Adagio, Aria, and Sonata were my sisters! When my vision came back, I grinned... And Adagio, who more than likely saw what I saw, grinned back.
112111.title: I had a vision.

112111111.title: flyin solo

1121111111.content: As your walking thinking about how to take over the school you weren't watching where you were going and ended up walking right into Sunset Shimmer. "Oh hey there *insertnamehere* how's it going?" "Oh it's going pretty good. Especially since I found my sisters." You don't know why but as your talking to sunset your starting to feel "something". You say goodbye to Sunset and head towards the Lunchroom. Your feeling warm in your heart and you don't know why. You hear singing coming from the Cafeteria and you poke your head in to see your sisters singing and everyone getting angrier and angrier. However you notice that 5 girls including Sunset are not getting angry. You want to know how they're not being infected but you already told your sisters you wanted to go alone. So you close the door as silently as you can. What you didn't know was that the girls saw you poking your head out and closing the door. "Who was that?" Asked Rainbow Dash. "His name's *insertnamehere* and he's a new student along with those three girls." "That necklace on him looked just like the one's those girls are wearing." "Oh yeah I forgot to mention that *insertnamehere* is a brother to them." "HUH?!?" "I get it but I think he knows what's going on with our friends. I think we should get him alone and make him tell us what's going on." They all agreed at that idea. Everyone was looking all over the school for you. Pinkie spotted you on the Bleachers of the Football Field. She called her friends and also you heard it. You ran as fast as you could but unfortunately you were caught by Rainbow Dash. "Okay here now we saw you looking at your "sisters" in the Cafeteria. Mind telling us what they were doing to our friends?" "I'm never gonna tell you." They actually expected this to happen so they told Pinkie to give you a tickle torture until you told them everything. After a couple of minutes you finally cracked. You told them that you and your sisters were from Equestria and were planning to take over the school. As Rainbow was about to punch you Sunset stopped her. "Why'd you do that?" "Because maybe he can help us." "Uh why would HE help us? HE'S ONE OF THEM!!!" "I know that but he can still help us by telling us how to break the spell." However you didn't know how to break the spell. So Sunset got the idea that they should ask Princess Twilight. Sunset wrote in the book what happened and all about the new girls and you.
1121111111.title: sunset

1122.title: After

11221.content: You're just an ordinary boy who's school life is like a rollar coaster ride. It can go up in a good way or it can go down in a bad way. Nonetheless, you wandered around the halls thinking about one person, Sunset Shimmer. When you first met her, she was bullying and intimidating the other students and you didn't take to kindly to it. She then started teasing you, but you know that you can't let her taunts get to you, even though she was making your life complicating. However, you'd had noticed her sudden change of heart after the Battle of the Bands with her performing with the Rainbooms. Part of you really believed that Sunset has changed for the better, but another part of you thinks that she didn't and wants you to hate her. But you can't find it in yourself to hate her, no matter how much she'd harmed you emotionally. Afterwards though, you had seemed to be very distant from any area that involves her being there. You don't really know why, but you don't want to be away from her. It's like you want to be sitting next to her. You shook that part off and went somewhere that she can't be at. You go to the cafeteria and sit in the empty table you normally sit at. You figured that being alone is less complicated when you think about as you eat your lunch. You turned and see someone coming towards you. It wasn't Sunset though, it was
11221.title: Time after the Battle of the Band

choices: go up and talk to Sunset
stay hidden and hopedthat Sunset doesn't find you
112211.content:
You see that it's the very active rainbow-haired girl Rainbow Dash coming towards you with a smile on it.

"Hey *insert name*!" Rainbow Dash called out to you.

"Hey Rainbow Dash. What's up?" You asked as she sits next to you.

"Nothing. How about you?" Rainbow Dash asked as well.

"Same old stuff." You answered.

"Like keeping yourself distant from Sunset?" Rainbow Dash guessed.

"Yeah. That old stuff." You answered softly.

"You know, she's really changed a lot since the battle of the bands ended. You should, you know, talk to her." Rainbow Dash suggested.

"I really want to, but something inside of me is holding me back. Like I get really nervous when I tried to say something to her, but I just can't and run away." You explained.

"Really? Oh! I see what's happening here, you sly guy." Rainbow Dash teased you.

"What are you talking about?" You asked in confusion.

"Isn't it obvious, *insert name*? You're in love." Rainbow Dash said with a smirk and a cocked eyebrow up.

"What? You mean with Sunset? Am not!" You denied while blushing.

"Oh come on! I can see that sparkle in your eyes. She's got under her skin." Rainbow Dash teased you more.

"You're wrong!" You kept on being in denial still blushing red.

"Denial is the clincher, you know." Rainbow Dash continues to tease you.

"Will you cut it out?! It wouldn't work anyway!" You snapped.

"What do you mean?" Rainbow Dash asked.

"Even if I am in love with her, it won't matter. She probably thinks I still hate her considering that I've been avoiding her all this time." You explained yourself.

"No she doesn't. I promise you, she'll be thrilled to hear that some guy like you has feelings for her." Rainbow Dash said.

"I still need to think this over." You said.

"Okay, *insert name*. Whatever you say. See you around." Rainbow Dash said before leaving.

"You too, Rainbow." You said.

You then left the cafe and walk down the halls to see Sunset Shimmer with Applejack and Rarity. You blushed again and you decided to.....
112211.title: Friendly Advice

1122111.content:
You took a deep breathe and go up to what Rainbow Dash believes to be the girl of your dreams. You cleared your throat and Sunset, along with Applejack and Rarity, turned to see you. Sunset was surprised that your right in front of her instead of hiding and you try to find the right words to say to her.

"Uh. Hey, *insert name*." Sunset said nervously.

"Hey, Sunset." You said also nervously.

"How's it been, partner?" Applejack asked stepping in.

"Going good, Applejack. Good to see you. You too, Rarity." You said politely.

"It's good to see you too, my friend." Rarity said nicely.

You smiled at the two before looking at Sunset and can see a tiny bit of sadness in her eyes. It's obvious to you why because of you distance from her. You decided to take up what you and Rainbow Dash talked about before. Before you can say anything, Sunset beat you to the punch.

"Hey, girls? Can you two leaves us for a moment?" Sunset asked.

"Sure thing, Dear. Come along, Applejack. Let's give them their "privacy"." Rarity said while winking at Applejack.

"Okay then. See you two later." Applejack said before she and Rarity left you two alone.

You and Sunset looked away from each other for a bit before you two make eye contact. You believed that this maybe is a bad idea, but it's now or never.

"So, how are you?" You asked nervously.

"Good. You?" Sunset wondered with the same feeling of nervousness.

"Great." You said.

"Listen, *insert name*. I know you probably hate me after all of the things I did to you and everyone else here. That's why you've been avoiding me and I understand. I don't really expect any kind of forgiveness from you, anyways. I mean, who can?" Sunset said feeling too sad.

You knew she was gonna say that, but you can't just let her feel this way. So, you took your hand and placed it on her shoulder. Sunset looks at you as you go try to say something to her.

"I don't hate you, Sunset." You said.

"What?" Sunset asked a little surprised.

"Look, I know that what you did with you being a she-demon was pretty much unforgivable, but I can never hate you. The only hide myself from you because I wanted to see if you really do wanted to change like you say you do. Turns out that you did and proved me right." You explained.

Sunset feels tears coming down her face as she jumps up and wraps her arms around you to hug you tight. She started sobbing on your shoulder as you took your hand and, gently, pats her back while she cries.

"*insert name*! You're so forgiving! Thank you so much!" Sunset sobs while still hugging you.

"You're welcome. Now, come on. Stop crying. You'll ruined those pretty eyes of yours." You said before eye-widening on what you just said.

Sunset was surprised when you said that and she felt touched in her heart. No boy has ever told her that since she dated Flash. But you, hearing you saying that lifted her spirits up.

"You think that my eyes are pretty?" Sunset asked while drying the tears off of her face.

"Uuummm. Well. You see." You stuttered before sighing in defeat because it looks like the cat's out of the bag. "Yes, Sunset. The hair looks cool too." You commented her nicely.

"Wow. I don't know what to say. Thank you." Sunset said as she starts to smile again.

"You're welcome. Anyway, I wanted to come here to see if you want to hang out after school. You know, just the two of us." You said while blushing.

"*insert full name". Are you asking me on a date?" Sunset wondered.

"Do you wanted it to be?" You asked.

"Of course I do. I'll go out with you." Sunset said.

You can't believe that she said yes to you. Looks like things are getting better from here on out. That's when the final bell rang.

"Looks like it's time for our last class for the day." You said.

"That it is. Before I go, what do you want to do for our date?" Sunset asked.

"How about we go
1122111.title: Take the chance

11221111.content: Wowee it looks like you got yourself a date with the lovely Sunset Shimmer at the movies. Now the question is what movie are you two gonna see?
11221111.title: see a movie

choices: Sunset wants you to stay here for the night
1122111121.content:
“How about we go see a movie. I hear that the new Jumanji movie is really good.” You suggested.

“I so want to see that. I’ll see you there tonight.” Sunset said.

“8:00?” You wondered.

“7 would be better.” Sunset said.

“7 it is then. Later.” You said before heading off to class.

When it ended and school was done with, you went straight home and went to do your homework right when you walk through the door. After you finished, you got ready and told your mom that you’re going out. You made it to Sunset’s house and you ringed the doorbell. She then answered and you gasped at the beauty she really is.

“Glad you made it.” Sunset said with a smile.

“Yeah. So, you’re all set?” You wondered while blushing.

“I am. Let’s go.” Sunset said before you two made your way to the theater.

When you got there, you bought the tickets and snacks before going in to take your seats. The movie was rolling and you and Sunset liked some of the moments of the film, funny and exciting. You then felt her and on yours and it causes you to blush a little. Perhaps, Rainbow Dash was right about this after all. When the movie ended, you two used the bathroom and left the theater.

“That was awesome. Thank you for bringing me here.” Sunset said.

“Hey, it’s the best way to start over and a chance to do something cool. But, all and all, I had a good time too.” You said smiling.

“Hey, *insert name*? Can I give a little something?” Sunset asked.

“What is it?” You wondered.

“This.”

It was all that Sunset said before she grabbed the back of your head, pulled you in, and kissed you on the lips. It shocked you at first because you, absolutely, didn’t expect this to happen. The kiss got good as you return it back to her before you two let go of each other.

“Whoa! I didn’t see that coming. But that, actually, felt really good.” You complimented the kiss.

“Thanks. After the whole fiasco, I thought of you as a cute kind of guy. I just don’t know if you feel the same.” Sunset explained.

“Now you know.” You said with a smile.

You then took her home and give her a hug for a good night. You then turn around to go home.
1122111121.title: Going To The Movies With Sunset

11221111211.content:
"Hold on *Your Name Here*."
You paused and waited to find out why she said that.
"Yes Sunset? What is it?"
"W-w-well I was wondering if you'd like to....stay a little longer?" She asked while blushing super red.
"I would love to. Just let me tell my mom real quick."
"Okay then."
You called your mom and she said it was ok to stay longer just to be home before 11:00.
11221111211.title: Sunset wants you to stay here for the night

112211112111.content:
You and Sunset stayed at her place and just eat together. It felt really good that you were able to put the whole Fall Formal thing behind you two and to become a couple as well. Things are definitely looking up.

“This food is delicious.” You said.

“Glad you like it.” Sunset said.

“Listen, I want to say something to you that I want to let out for a while now.” You said blushing.

“What is it?” Sunset wondered.

“I... I love you.” You said and Sunset was blushing a lot.

“Really?” Sunset asked.

“Yeah. I thought I’d never believed it to be true. But it is.” You said.

“Oh, (your name here). I love you too.” Sunset said holding your hand.

Now that you two confessed, what happened next?
112211112111.title: Your time at Sunset's house

choices: something was attacking you and Sunset
11221112.content:
"Sounds good to me. I'll see you there." Sunset said before leaving.

"You too. See ya." You said.

You smiled that not only you're happy to see the good side of Sunset, but you managed to get a date with her. You walked towards your last class and you see Rainbow Dash sitting the desk behind you. Rainbow sees you and you gave her a thumbs up, which she knows why. After school was done, you go home and you did your homework before going back out.

"Where are you going, Sweetie?" Your mom asked.

"I've got a date tonight, Mom." You answered.

"Really?! That's wonderful! You would make your father proud." Your mother said with a smile.

"I sure would. See you later, Mom!" You said before leaving.

You reached to SugerCube Corner and you see Sunset already inside. You go in and Sunset waved to say hi.

"*insert name*! I'm so glad you're here." Sunset said with happiness as she hugs you.

"Me too, Sunset. Come on. I'll buy you a shake." You suggested.

You ordered shakes for you and Sunset. You two make some conversations with each other before you accidentally got whipped cream on your nose. Sunset giggled a little as you got the idea of putting a funny selfie with you and Sunset and your cream-covered nose on your phone. You wipped the cream off and you continue on with the date before you and Sunset head out of the building.

"That was fun, *insert name*. I really had a good time." Sunset said smiling.

"I'm glad you enjoyed it, Sunset." You said also smiling.

"Thanks to you. I think I can go for another date." Sunset said.

"Well, I have something I want to give you." You said.

"A present? For me?" Sunset wondered in surprise.

"That's right, but it's not one you can wrap in a box." You said.

Sunset was confused before you took your hand and placed it on her cheek. She was getting the idea of what it might be as you two look each other in the eyes, deeply. You then lean in and plant a soft kiss on her lips before she kissed you back. You break up the kiss and looked at each other again.

"Wow! That was really good." Sunset said happily.

"Guess that makes us boyfriend and girlfriend now?" You wondered.

"I guess so." Sunset said.

"I love you." You said softly.

"I love you too." Sunset said nicely.

You two kissed again before you
11221112.title: A sweet date

As you and Sunset make-out, you see that your vision starts to blur and Sunset grew concern for your health.

"Are you okay? You don't look so good." Sunset asked.

"I'm fine. Really." You answered.

Sunset placed her hand on your head and checks to see if you have a fever, ehich she just finds out now.

"*insert name*! You're burning up! We need to get you home!" Sunset suggested in panic.

Before you can say anything else, you fall down on your front onto the ground and went into an unconscious state.

"*insert name*! *insert name*!!! Someone call for help!!!" Sunset cried out as she holds your body close to her.

An ambulance arrives and Sunset went with the paramedics to take you to the hospital. While heading straight there, you begin to have strange visions in your mind.

121.content:
*insert name here* looked into her mirror and brushed through her silver hair once more. "*insert name here*!" Her mother called. "You're going to be late!"
         "Sorry, Mom!" She called back to her. *insert name here* took one last look. Her snow white skin complimented her hair perfectly. The ruffled aqua cami she had picked out looked great on her. *insert name here* grabbed her bag and ran downstairs, grabbing a piece of toast on her way out the door. Gotta catch the bus! She ran toward the bus stop.
Please, still be there. She prayed. The young high school girl breathed a sigh of relief as she turned the corner and saw the bus waiting for her. She ran for it and climbed up the steps. *insert name here* looked around for a place to sit. She spotted two open seats. One was next to a white-skinned, purple-haired girl. Little did she know that this girl was the go-to girl when it came to fashion, Rarity. The other seat was by a small, orange-skinned, green-haired boy with glasses. This kid's name was Snails, although *insert name here* did not know that.
*insert name here* thought for a moment about who to sit by, then made her decision. She would sit by...

121221.content: "Wanna go out?" He says to you. You blush, and decide if you like him back. You say,
121221.title: Wanna go out?

1212211.content: "Yes, i would love to!" You said. "C-Cool then after s-school then?" Snails stuttered. "Okay." You replied. Right after you said that the bus stopped front of a big school. Everyone got off it and entered the school.
1212211.title: Yes, i would love to!

122.content: Dose this take place during the rainbow rocks movie or sometime after it?
122.title: After the movie(Sunset Shimmer is nice)

1221.content: And what part of "during the movie" is this?
1221.title: During

info.brief_description: You attend Canterlot High as a new student and meet Twlight and her friends.
info.description: When you say the characters name say it as *insert name here* I want the readers to feel like there the new student. I want nothing dark or gory. There can be a relationship between *insert name here* and any other character but just normal boyfriend and girlfriend stuff like kissing and holding hands.
